name: UpdateFileSystem
description:
Updates a file system in a specific project by ID.

Call this tool to update the settings or data of a specific file system within a given project on Datadog. Use it when modifications to the file system are needed, such as changing configurations or data structures.

parameters.name: file_system_id
parameters.description: A UUID string uniquely identifying the file system to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the project you want to access. Use the project ID to specify which project's file system to update. Retrieve the ID by calling the /api/projects/ endpoint if needed.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: file_system_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object with details like id, path, type, depth, ref, href, meta, shortcut, created_at, and last_viewed_at to update the file system.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
